section.p: Indicator of contraindications to thrombolytic use

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11477 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.82"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11195)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10431)/@code="67523-1" Contraindication for thrombolytic use NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10432)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11623), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExistenceOfContraindicationsToThrombolyticUse 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.41 DYNAMIC (CONF:10433)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.31
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11195)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10431)/@code="67523-1" Contraindication for thrombolytic use NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10432)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11623), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExistenceOfContraindicationsToThrombolyticUse 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.41 DYNAMIC (CONF:10433)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.31

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.82"/> <code code="67523-1" displayName="Contraindication for thrombolytic use NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
